key_features: Able to be washed without damage
Precision hex shape for enhanced ground stability
ai_description: A set of two vibrant blue dumbbells with distinctive hexagonal ends, featuring the KAKSS brand and 5 KG weight markings in crisp white lettering. The dumbbells have a textured neoprene coating that provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. Images show them displayed on clean white surfaces and in practical gym environments, with one lifestyle shot depicting a woman using them during a home workout. The packaging highlights key benefits like being perfect for home and gym use with non-slip coating.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts and home gym users
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
